    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        public static play.mvc.Result addUser()
        1. Gets the username, password and email from the form from the Registration.html page; 2. If the username or email is already in our database, we redirect to the "/registration.html" 3. Creates the User using the User.create() method; 4. And redirects to the index.html page;
        Returns:

      • terms

        public static play.mvc.Result terms()

      • addPikStore

        public static play.mvc.Result addPikStore()

      • findUser

        public static play.mvc.Result findUser()
        1. Gets the username and password from the form from the Login.html page; 2. The finder() method finds the User with the entered username; assigns to the User u; 3. If no User has been found, - redirecting to Failed.html page; 4. If the User has been found - Checks whether the password is correct; 5. If the password is wrong - redirecting to Failed.html page; 6. If the password is correct - redirecting to Index.html page; Note* Store the username in session variable if the Login is successful;
        Returns:

      • findProfileProducts

        public static play.mvc.Result findProfileProducts()
        For the profiles products - that the current logged in user that has published; The query search for all the products are published by the user logged in; And renders the profile.html page;
        Returns:
        renders the profile.html page with the list of products mentioned;

      • find_bought_products

        public static play.mvc.Result find_bought_products()
        This method lists all the bought items of the User logged in; If no products where bought by the user we inform him about it;
        Returns:
        Result;

      • findSoldProducts

        public static play.mvc.Result findSoldProducts()
        This method lists all the items of the User logged in that he has sold; If no products where sold by the user we inform him about it;
        Returns:
        Result;

      • saveFile

        public static play.mvc.Result saveFile()
        Upload image for User profile, and show picture on user /profile.html. If file is not image format jpg, jpeg or png redirect user on profile without uploading image. If file size is bigger then 2MB, redirect user on profile without uploading image.
        Returns:

      • purchaseProcessing

        public static play.mvc.Result purchaseProcessing(int id)
        Method integrates PayPal with application, using access token. It adds amount, currency, payer, description, intent and state for payment.
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        renders the pages eeither the showProduct page or purchasesuccess page;

      • purchaseSuccess

        public static play.mvc.Result purchaseSuccess(int id)
        Method validates payment with existing user. After binding from dynamic form it uses access token to transact payment.
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        Renders the page where the user has to approve the transaction from our site in order to finish the paypal paying process;

      • sendMessage

        public static play.mvc.Result sendMessage(int id)
        Method checks if user exists, and if does it calls saveMessage method with same id for message

        Returns:
        Renders the message page with the user logged in and the receiver;

      • saveMessage

        public static play.mvc.Result saveMessage(int id)
        Method that binds values from sendMessage form and creates new message using create method in PrivateMessage model.
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        redirects to the page allMessages;
